channel.title: Changelog Feed
channel.description: Changes for each version of the software.

item.title: Version 1.108.27 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.27

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Scrollbar issue fixed
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Focus of IconTabFilter is not changing
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: Focus element is scrolled into view
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpProvider: Absolute Path is now correctly encoded
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: Search is complete announcement now has correct result count
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Fixed currency code with TextArrangement
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: Prevent NaN timestamp for Date/Time columns

item.title: Version 1.108.23 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.23

  • Library: sap.fe.common
    • Type: FIX, Description: The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls with validation errors and back-end errors
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where OData service was triggered twice for each sorting event in a table
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where OData service was triggered twice for each sorting event in a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now align the column correctly when the table entity has no key
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls with validation errors and back-end errors
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where OData service was triggered twice for each sorting event in a table
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Item selection and highlighting with dynamic suggestions now fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.List/Table: Accessibility improvements
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FormattedText: preserve H1, H2, H3, H4, H5 and H6 tags default 'display' CSS property
  • Library: sap.ndc
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ndc: Add one parameter to enable/disable Barcode Input Dialog
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We are now setting the correct variant while saving a tile
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that registering a filter provider at the message button helper works fine even if outdated binding path info is present
    • Type: FIX, Description: Record selection on the UI table is now cleared after executing the function import action
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.ToolHeader: Padding when there is no menu button fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnsController: Duplicated indexes of the Columns fix
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: reset now works as expected
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/routing: find parent route from the router of the inheritance parent
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.test.autowaiter._timeoutWaiter: Callback arguments corrected
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.richtexteditor.Toolbar: Fix failing qUnit tests in Firefox

item.title: Version 1.108.21 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.21

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the handling of 412 errors when the action is triggered using the chevron
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: adjust to horizon theme updates
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Uses correct active text parameters
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: validation errors from value help are not propagated outside
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Fire intervalSelect event date from another month
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: DateNavigation now uses firstDayOfWeek
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateRangeSelection: Value is now formatted even if matching with previous value
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: removed max-width of the menu
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: apply horizon theme updates
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the registration as a dirty state provider can be avoided when the application is read only
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: Extra space below FilterBar filters is now removed
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Prepare for upcoming 'unload' event deprecation and deprecate APIs 'onWindowBeforeUnload', 'onWindowUnload' and 'onWindowError' in 'sap/ui/core/Component'
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataModel#resetChanges: do not remove persistent messages
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: removed max-width of the menu
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Reset selectedSection corrected
  • Library: sap.viz
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap viz: skip unstable test

item.title: Version 1.108.24 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.24

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer show the technical messages from the default OData V4 model in the message dialog
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display SAP Fiori launchpad when a user discards a draft by navigating back using the shell button if the object page is the first entry in the browser history
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: Arrow has hover state now
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: For the list report, semantic date is now shown when default values are maintained
    • Type: FIX, Description: While checking for an equivalent key, sibling entity is not considered now during draft creation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added custom data to use FLP timezone for smart table in the analytical list page and list report object page
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.NavigationListItem: Context menu now successfully opens on items with 'href' set
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Label is now properly updated and displayed on UoM scenario
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Empty operator for Edm.Guid type now sends default guid instead of empty string
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterProvider: Tooltip is correctly set for numeric fields
    • Type: FIX, Description: VariantConverterTo: Exclude sign is now correct for multiple ranges
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: applyVariant now respects given order of items as argument
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Single filter field doesn't select row if there are multiple rows with same key
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v4.lib._CollectionCache#read: avoid endless busy indicator sometimes when scrolling up
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: adjust week days announcement

item.title: Version 1.108.25 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.25

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: fix error on opening Popover
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Fix hiding of popover due to re-rendering
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DraftIndicator: JSDoc corrected
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue that persisted while refreshing the table after executing the function import action
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have now improved our logic to set the focus on the first editable field on the object page when switch to edit mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: Clean up actions are now performed correctly when the transient message dialog is closed in all the scenarios
    • Type: FIX, Description: An error message dialog is now displayed instead of navigating to the 'Object Not Found' page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now improved the back navigation in fixed column layout when a draft is cancelled in between
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: remove focus catcher
    • Type: FIX, Description: comp.SmartVariantManagement: property enabled handling corrected
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.analytics.AnalyticalBinding: fire data received event if request is aborted
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataModel#submitChangesWithHeaders: ensure change requests use custom headers
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/ODataMetadata#_getPropertyMetadata: fix for complex type property
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataTreeBinding: Fix grouping of Application filters in OperationMode.Server
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.analytics.AnalyticalBinding: handle properties of type Edm.time in grouping

item.title: Version 1.108.26 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.26

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've introduced the isTrustedSource property as a security enhancement for the PDFViewer control as detailed in the API reference
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: Escape text value when creating tokens with validator
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Initialise event is now fired after metadata initialization

item.title: Version 1.108.28 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.28

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Prevent value DOM update when password type is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Status with icon and text overflows correctly now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SearchField: Suggestions are correctly visualized
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Select: Required label fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: There is no error when destroying and adding radio buttons on select
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: Add proper bottom margin for all navigation list items
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: correct uniqueness detection when TextArrangement is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: DateRangeType: Fixed regex after translation change
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: Press event of Go button is now correctly fired
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.analytics.AnalyticalBinding: sorting grouped columns when autoExpandMode = "Sequential"
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: RichTextEditor: Undo and Redo with keyboard do not work
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: add styling for disabled calendar items
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: adjust header buttons width

item.title: Version 1.108.30 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.30

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Value is not cleared on invalidation when type password is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Back type button has correct hover colour
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Select: Required label fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Fixed currency code update
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.util.LibraryInfo: Loosen baseUrl regex check
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/.library: Remove wrong component for sap/ui/core/util/MockServer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.performance.XHRInterceptor: Fix CORS check
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.DateFormat.qunit: Fix flaky tests
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: mdc.FilterBar: enhance check for wrong values of filter fields

item.title: Version 1.114.16 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.114.16

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateTimeField: Doesn't throw error when the binding type is string.
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: P13nBuilder: Add button is now visible

item.title: Version 1.120.13 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.13

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Title alignment
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPageHeader: Aligned with visual specification
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: Avoid creating invalidate promise on table update when the update reason is 'UNKNOWN'
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Prevent value DOM update when password type is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Prevent user value override
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageToast: Fix permanent display
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: Filters order is now correctly saved
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterController: Custom controls are no longer propagated from SmartFilterBar
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.Currency: amount scale is used instead of currency's decimal places
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.Unit: do not overwrite Unit's maxFractionDigits format option
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.Unit: amount scale is used instead of unit's decimal places
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration cards: Fixed pagination with microcharts
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: RichTextEditor: Undo and Redo with keyboard do not work

item.title: Version 1.120.17 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.17

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Suppress invalidation of footer
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Stop initial re-rendering of the input field when type password and clear icon are set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: icon is shown correctly now for theme horizon HCB and HCW. The status is now aligned correctly in sap.ui.table.Table.
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Back type button has correct hover colour
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SearchField: Parameter type is passed correctly to ResourceBundle
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterPanel: Reset now works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: PersonalizationController: restore fixedColumnCount
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: description path in display mode is correct when having expandNavigationProperties set
    • Type: FIX, Description: comp.SmartVariantManagement: wait for translation finishing
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: InputState of Model is now cleared
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: copy button of the table is now enabled based on the selection
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONModel#loadData: Don't use JSONP
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.util.LibraryInfo: Loosen baseUrl regex check
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/.library: Remove wrong component for sap/ui/core/util/MockServer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.performance.XHRInterceptor: Fix CORS check
    • Type: FIX, Description: util/Mobile: update window size with delay after viewport is set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.DateFormat.qunit: Fix flaky tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap\ui\core\format\DateFormat.fnCreateDate: set UTCFullYear must be set with all components
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.DynamicSideContent: fixed firing of the breakpointChanged event
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: AnalyticalTable: Error when binding to named model
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: add tooltips for calendar legend types
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Fix non-expanding Table

item.title: Version 1.120.6 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.6

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with applying a transient iAppState
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now execute the PrepareAction property by pressing Enter on object page tables in apps using the flexible column layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue for applications using the flexible column layout, which was causing the Save or Cancel action to fail after refreshing the page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly handle 412 errors for critical actions
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with displaying the text annotation in the quick view title
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with displaying the text annotation in the quick view title
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with exporting columns added using page variant management in a list report with multiple views
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Apply additional padding on FF
    • Type: FIX, Description: P13nConditionPanel: Fields of Between operation are now in correct order
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue with the minified URL that was not opening the application
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: The application state is now restored for multiple table view
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataModel#submitChangesWithHeaders: ensure change requests use custom headers
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: P13nBuilder: Add button is now visible
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: adding padding when two calendars are next to each other
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Fix collapsing header

item.title: Version 1.120.7 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.7

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: Title binding now works properly if the value is a path with conditions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where the corrupt context of a previously visited object page resulted in an error message while subsequently loading the same object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: The DateTime data type now supports the UTC format
    • Type: FIX, Description: When repeating action triggers for multiple rows that have received a 412 warning on action execution, we no longer trigger the action for rows that have executed their action successfully
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnMenu: Provide a proper overflow handling
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: correct single text arrangement when multiple calls to setFilterData are performed
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Initialise event is now fired after metadata initialization
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.ODataMetaModel#getODataValueLists: fetch missing metadata

item.title: Version 1.120.8 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.8

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: If the manifest configuration for an object page uses a contextPath parameter instead of entitySet, we ensure that a confirmation dialog is displayed while navigating away from the object page in edit mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly display the custom message as a message strip on the object page header upon initial navigation using the onAfterBinding controller extension
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: If the manifest configuration for an object page uses a contextPath parameter instead of entitySet, we ensure that a confirmation dialog is displayed while navigating away from the object page in edit mode
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: Missing label in ColumnMenu
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Remove scrollbar from snack layer when not needed

item.title: Version 1.120.9 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.9

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Applications can now dynamically display the ‘Summarize’ button if the prerequisites are fulfilled
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now clear the selection in a table after applying a search or a filter, except for responsive tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the message popover for tables displays the column name that’s associated to the error
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the setRecommendations API where the recommendations weren't always displaying correctly for all fields
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly manage the page ID parameter in the changePageConfiguration extension point to apply configuration changes that can also be used as a feature toggle
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Applications can now dynamically display the ‘Summarize’ button if the prerequisites are fulfilled
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now clear the selection in a table after applying a search or a filter, except for responsive tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now align the column correctly when the table entity has no key
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now clear the messageTargetProperty to ensure the navigation works correctly after saving changes on the subobject page
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Applications can now dynamically display the ‘Summarize’ button if the prerequisites are fulfilled
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Focus of IconTabFilter is not changing
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: Focus element is scrolled into view
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've introduced the isTrustedSource property as a security enhancement for the PDFViewer control as detailed in the API reference
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: Resolve issue preventing text selection with mouse
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that static tile can be created in cases where custom semantic date field is applied
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Duplicate event handlers in some scenarios are now fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterPanel: Single DynamicDateRange fields do not add default values
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Data Model update fix
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Lib: Improve Error Message reg. Pseudo Modules

item.title: Version 1.120.11 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.11

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Discard Draft popup works correctly when navigating away from a subobject page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that integer type fields can be used in mass edit scenario from SAP UI5 version 1.120
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the list report properties for multiple views annotated using UI.SelectionFields are available among other filter bar properties
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls with validation errors and back-end errors
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now convert the select options of the value help from the source app to the correct filter conditions in the target app
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display SAP Fiori launchpad when a user discards a draft by navigating back using the shell button if the object page is the first entry in the browser history
    • Type: FIX, Description: The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls with validation errors and back-end errors
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the list report properties for multiple views annotated using UI.SelectionFields are available among other filter bar properties
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: Is truncated correctly in sap.m.Table
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core: Allow for async control event handlers
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: Search is complete announcement now has correct result count
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Currency model update in sap.ui.table.Table
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: mvc/Controller: Replace function call with apply
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core: Allow for async control event handlers
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core: Allow for async control event handlers
  • Library: sap.ui.rta
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core: Allow for async control event handlers

item.title: Version 1.120.12 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.12

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: When applying the iAppState, we now wait until the object page is ready and then set the selected section
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now request messages when the manifest setting for an object page uses a contextPath parameter
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the navigate function in the routing controller extension supports the preserveHistory parameter
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider the intent parameters of SAP Fiori launchpad while displaying the title with a primary action as a link in the quick view
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with row selection in a context-dependent value help dialog with multiple selections.
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: When applying the iAppState, we now wait until the object page is ready and then set the selected section
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SearchField: Suggestions are correctly visualized
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: Resolve issue preventing text selection with mouse
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: adjust resource bundle API calls
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: There is no error when destroying and adding radio buttons on select
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: adjust header buttons width

item.title: Version 1.120.10 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.10

  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the TimePicker is shown for FilterFields of type Edm.TimeOfDay
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the message popover is no longer shown in display mode for messages added using the table API addMessages
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: ResourceBundle getText method properly used
    • Type: FIX, Description: m.VariantManagement: correction for deletion indicator
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Fixed currency code with TextArrangement
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: Prevent NaN timestamp for Date/Time columns

item.title: Version 1.120.16 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.16

  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed an issue that caused unintended row bindings while interacting with draggable shapes in the chart
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issues with the dynamic update of overlays in the expanded row scenario
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Selection event is fired only once
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectMarker: focus visible in sap.ui.table.Table
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: change event now provides correct value when constraints are violated
    • Type: FIX, Description: Personalization: column freeze no longer blocks settings dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: DateRangeType: Fixed when don't have json on initialize
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.(Currency|Unit): use amount scale default 0 instead of currency's or unit's decimal places
    • Type: FIX, Description: Add sap-system to OData V4 service URLs

item.title: Version 1.121.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.121.0

  • Library: sap.chart
    • Type: FIX, Description: Rename onlocalizationChanged to onlocalizationChanged
  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: : Integration Cards: Image with text overlay can be used in the Object Card
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.ShellBar: Search and copilot reworked
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Enable CSRF tokens usage through new binding syntax
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.GridContainer: nested HTML elements are now correct
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: DateTimestamp text in the header is translated now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Rounding issue corected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: LayoutType documentation improved
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Documentation improved
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Fixed incorrect rendering of separator
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: samples updated
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Fix failing OPA tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Shortcut: trigger "blur" within a timeout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: fix not visible column
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Reveal/conceal mechanism fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: actionBarExpanded now works when there is only one action item

item.title: Version 1.121.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.121.1

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with applying a transient iAppState
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the text area label is hidden if it is the only field in a section or subsection
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the text area label is hidden if it is the only field in a section or subsection
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've introduced the isTrustedSource property as a security enhancement for the PDFViewer control as detailed in the API reference
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Focus of IconTabFilter is not changing
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: Focus element is scrolled into view
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Validation of custom ComboBox is now improved
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Duplicate event handlers in some scenarios are now fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Non Mandatory ComboBox validation

item.title: Version 1.121.2 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.121.2

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that prevented end users from discarding drafts
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with the application breaking after discarding a draft
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now always request the value help list binding context after executing a filter
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageToast: Fix permanent display
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange translation is correct now in Dutch
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: Resolve issue preventing text selection with mouse
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterController: Custom controls are no longer propagated from SmartFilterBar
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Common.Text value in request
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration cards: Fixed pagination with microcharts

item.title: Version 1.121.3 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.121.3

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now clear the selection in a table after applying a search or a filter, except for responsive tables
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now clear the selection in a table after applying a search or a filter, except for responsive tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now align the column correctly when the table entity has no key
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support the ValueListParameterIn property in the value help for a MultiValueField
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Prevent value DOM update when password type is used
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Unhandled promise rejection resolved
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: Filters order is now correctly saved
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.Currency: amount scale is used instead of currency's decimal places
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.Unit: do not overwrite Unit's maxFractionDigits format option
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.Unit: amount scale is used instead of unit's decimal places
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: RichTextEditor: Undo and Redo with keyboard do not work

item.title: Version 1.121.5 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.121.5

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Discard Draft popup works correctly when navigating away from a subobject page
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Discard Draft popup works correctly when navigating away from a subobject page
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Back type button has correct hover colour
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Value is not cleared on invalidation when type password is used
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap-icons-tnt: Fixed wrong icon names
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: request valuelist fields
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.DateFormat.qunit: Fix flaky tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap\ui\core\format\DateFormat.fnCreateDate: set UTCFullYear must be set with all components
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.(Currency|Unit): use amount scale default 0 instead of currency's or unit's decimal places

item.title: Version 1.121.4 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.121.4

  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the message popover is no longer shown in display mode for messages added using the table API addMessages

item.title: Version 1.122.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.122.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Adds option for hyphenation in header
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.GridContainer: Enable support for UI5 Flexibility actions
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Scrollbar issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.ProductSwitch: Acc sample improved
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Unbound actions can now also trigger side effects
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use additional properties to adapt list report tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We no longer display the semantic link if the quick view isn't defined and an app isn't assigned to the user's role
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now ensure that properties referenced by a LineItem annotated with UI.Hidden are hidden as well
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support displaying fields with a fixed value list as radio buttons
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: End users can now delete the empty rows of a table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide getCurrentVariantKey and setCurrentVariantKey as public APIs for the TableAPI
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: For columns with a text arrangement annotation, we no longer display ‘Description’ as an option in the ‘Columns’ tab of the personalization dialog of the table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've updated our API documentation and the descriptions in the flexible programming model with the information that providing the ID is mandatory when creating a Field building block
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with the application breaking after discarding a draft
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where the corrupt context of a previously visited object page resulted in an error message while subsequently loading the same object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the correct order of fields in the Create popup
    • Type: FIX, Description: When repeating action triggers for multiple rows that have received a 412 warning on action execution, we no longer trigger the action for rows that have executed their action successfully
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where filter fields containing the UI.AdaptationHidden property with a navigation path weren't applied to the filter request even though they were added in the UI.SelectionFields annotation.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that trigger actions are executed in separate changesets
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the default SemanticDate operator works as expected
    • Type: FIX, Description: The DateTime data type now supports the UTC format
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with applying a transient iAppState
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now execute the PrepareAction property by pressing Enter on object page tables in apps using the flexible column layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue for applications using the flexible column layout, which was causing the Save or Cancel action to fail after refreshing the page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with destroying a flexible column layout view when navigating back from it
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure filter fields from the manifest are not added to a custom filter bar pointing to a different entity set
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the OData request for the Delete action
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly display the custom message as a message strip on the object page header upon initial navigation using the onAfterBinding controller extension
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that in page mode, the section title is hidden only for sections with a single control
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use additional properties to adapt list report tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We no longer display the semantic link if the quick view isn't defined and an app isn't assigned to the user's role
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now ensure that properties referenced by a LineItem annotated with UI.Hidden are hidden as well
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support displaying fields with a fixed value list as radio buttons
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: End users can now delete the empty rows of a table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide getCurrentVariantKey and setCurrentVariantKey as public APIs for the TableAPI
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've updated our API documentation and the descriptions in the flexible programming model with the information that providing the ID is mandatory when creating a Field building block
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that aggregatable properties are no longer added to the sort options
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the quick view popover description is correctly displayed by using the TextArrangement annotation in the HeaderInfo.Description annotation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where filter fields containing the UI.AdaptationHidden property with a navigation path weren't applied to the filter request even though they were added in the UI.SelectionFields annotation.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the avatar is displayed without cropping its sides
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider the value null for filter conditions if the In-Parameter is annotated with InitialValueIsSignificant
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display the 'Others' group in value help fields which are dropdown
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the text area label is hidden if it is the only field in a section or subsection
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue when adding and removing custom columns containing building blocks from the table personalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with handling the navigation path when evaluating the filter conditions in the value list
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue with the processing of the ODataListBinding in the Define Conditions tab
    • Type: FIX, Description: When using browser autofill, we no longer read from the undefined control of the related value help
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that MDC table properties can no longer be changed in adaption projects
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure filter fields from the manifest are not added to a custom filter bar pointing to a different entity set
    • Type: FIX, Description: The 'Go' button in the filter bar of a custom table now triggers a data request every time it is selected
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly update the headerLevel property value when a section or subsection title is merged with the control title
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We no longer display the semantic link if the quick view isn't defined and an app isn't assigned to the user's role
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support displaying fields with a fixed value list as radio buttons
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: End users can now delete the empty rows of a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the correct order of fields in the Create popup
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the avatar is displayed without cropping its sides
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the focus on an object page is set to the first mandatory field on small screen devices
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the text area label is hidden if it is the only field in a section or subsection
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with exporting columns added using page variant management in a list report with multiple views
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly update the headerLevel property value when a section or subsection title is merged with the control title
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the title does not overlap with global actions on the object page
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now enabled the visualization of normal shapes together with the stock charts in a Gantt row
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: always render 6 weeks
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: render disabled dates in Week & OneMonth views
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.ColorPalette: add selected state

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core: Allow for async control event handlers
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: ValueHelp is shown when interacting with keyboard

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabHeader: Close tab popover when the header area is clicked
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: Visual tests ownership added
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Image: Acc sample improved
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectMarker: focus visible in sap.ui.table.Table
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: selectAll button alignment
    • Type: FIX, Description: Form: missing spaces in RadioButtonGroup
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: There is no error when destroying and adding radio buttons on select
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've introduced the isTrustedSource property as a security enhancement for the PDFViewer control as detailed in the API reference
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: Focus element is scrolled into view
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: remove padding coming from the Dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: The JS Date is being replaced with UI5Date
    • Type: FIX, Description: SinglePlanningCalendarMonthGrid: Focusing on the first element when selecting an entire week
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Selection event is fired only once
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ComboBox: Seleted item is scrolled into view
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Focus of IconTabFilter is not changing
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Panel: Header's padding adjusted
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Fire startDateChange event date from another month
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Avatar: Wide initials fix
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: Resolve issue preventing text selection with mouse
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Space press no longer scrolls
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Space event prevention remove
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePickerSliders: are aligned correctly on tablet
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: The JS Date is being replaced with UI5Date
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Logic fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: revert icon change
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: UI.Hidden annotation is now supported in SmartTable within the analytical list page and the list report
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: The quick view content can now be displayed by clicking the ObjectIdentifier link in the list report and analytical list page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now added the toolbar buttons to the context menu in the list report and object page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: The object page tables now supports path based UI.Hidden annotation
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support the creation of rows functionality for disabled fields in the empty rows within grid table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now performed certain bug fixes on context menu in the list report
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now adapted the title font size for the horizon theme in the analytical list page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the save button label is now displayed properly on the mobile devices
    • Type: FIX, Description: The header style of property now sets to the smart table and smart chat sets to 'H4' when a section has only one sub-section
    • Type: FIX, Description: The application state is now properly restored for multiple table view
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SmartField: Supports TextArrangement for NUMC
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SmartFilterBar: Date fields now support the "Today" button
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Currency model update in sap.ui.table.Table
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: not throwing exception when collective search is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Fixed currency code with TextArrangement
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: respect visible property of ControlConfiguration
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: Search is complete announcement now has correct result count
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: pasting one row with multiple columns now behaves correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Validation of custom ComboBox is now improved
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: filterChange event is now correctly fired on Variant change
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Duplicate event handlers in some scenarios are now fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Data Model update
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Non Mandatory ComboBox validation

  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: mvc/Controller: Replace function call with apply
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core: Allow for async control event handlers
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.Unit: amount scale is used instead of unit's decimal places

item.title: Version 1.122.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.122.1

  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: Restoring private accessor to internal control

item.title: Version 1.123.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.123.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Error message for invalid request configuration is now translated
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPageTitle: Fix overlaping of snappedContent
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.Shellbar: FCL sample fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.ProductSwitchItem: Aria-checked attribute added
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.GridContainer: Fix in focus handling for tiles
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.cards.NumericHeader: Loading placeholder of subtitle and unit now covers content underneath
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: The PresentationVariant API can now also be used with TreeTable and AnalyticalTable
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a setter method for the SelectionVariant in the Chart building block
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a getter method for the SelectionVariant in the Chart building block
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a setter method for the SelectionVariant in the Table building block
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a getter method for the SelectionVariant in the Table building block
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now set a request size limit for the export in a table using the exportRequestSize setting in the manifest or in the Macro table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now disable copying to clipboard in a table using the disableCopyToCliboard setting in the manifest
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support the RequestAtLeast annotation in the analytical table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We no longer display the row count indicator in tables with a quick filter
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now configure the x-axis of a chart as the time axis in the content area of an analytical list page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use SAP Fiori tools in adaptation projects to adapt the list report
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Range pasting is now available for grid tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support dynamic expressions in semantic object annotations
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now ensure the handling of NavigationRestriction is in line with the protocol
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the empty row in a grid table remains at the last position, even after new rows are created by pasting data to the table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the calculation of the target entity name that led to incorrect recommendations
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly set the focus on the target field once the user clicks the warning message on the popover
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now re-trigger the side effects for actions that fail due to strict handling with multiple messages for a single context
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with using the checkbox control when collaborative draft is enabled
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure an OData query is no longer sent when technical keys are provided as URL parameters for launching an application
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with displaying the Field building block when its semantic object is defined using a formatter
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now add formatters to the UI adaptation projects to control the enablement and visibility of actions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the setRecommendations API where the recommendations weren't always displaying correctly for all fields.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue related to templating on custom columns
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue that didn't allow the user to execute the copy action twice
    • Type: FIX, Description: Title binding now works properly if the value is a path with conditions
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: The PresentationVariant API can now also be used with TreeTable and AnalyticalTable
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a setter method for the SelectionVariant in the Chart building block
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a getter method for the SelectionVariant in the Chart building block
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a setter method for the SelectionVariant in the Table building block
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a getter method for the SelectionVariant in the Table building block
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now set a request size limit for the export in a table using the exportRequestSize setting in the manifest or in the Macro table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now disable copying to clipboard in a table using the disableCopyToCliboard setting in the manifest
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support the RequestAtLeast annotation in the analytical table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now configure the x-axis of a chart as the time axis in the content area of an analytical list page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use SAP Fiori tools in adaptation projects to adapt the list report
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Applications can now disable the history of recently entered values for certain fields
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Range pasting is now available for grid tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support dynamic expressions in semantic object annotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly label the quick view facet annotation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the links are correctly displayed on the quick view popover, when a dynamic semantic object is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now reset changes only after ListBinding is resumed, using the resumeAsync method instead of resume
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with displaying the Field building block when its semantic object is defined using a formatter
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now enhance the request of the Table building block before rebinding it for multiple views
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that insights cards appear in My Home if cross-navigation is configured in the related parent app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now always request the value help list binding context after executing a filter
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue related to templating on custom columns
    • Type: FIX, Description: The Form building block now works with UI adaptation and OData containment
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer show an error message in the console when the filter bar is hidden
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider the CssDefaults annotation in the calculation of the column width for responsive tables on small screen devices
  • Library: sap.fe.navigation
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: The PresentationVariant API can now also be used with TreeTable and AnalyticalTable
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now configure the x-axis of a chart as the time axis in the content area of an analytical list page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use SAP Fiori tools in adaptation projects to adapt the list report
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Applications can now disable the history of recently entered values for certain fields
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now ensure the handling of NavigationRestriction is in line with the protocol
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've optimized how data is fetched when an object page is displayed
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the links are correctly displayed on the quick view popover, when a dynamic semantic object is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly request the count of all visible tabs on the ListReport
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer show an error message in the console when the filter bar is hidden
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now added the isPinConnector event parameter to show if the shape is a pin connector or not when the ShapeMouseEnter event is triggered
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now enabled the display for millisecond level zoom in the Gantt timeline
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Providing weekNumberPress and selectedDatesChange events
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: Show 12h format if the display format contains the symbol B
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core.IconPool: Update icon font v5.8 and v4.20

    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Menu, sap.ui.unified.Menu: added MenuItem shortcutText property
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: implemented Custom Content in Appointments

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButton: hover and focus visual fixes

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: Displayed correctly in footer when button mode is "Split"

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.inputUtils.ListHelpers: Group items properly added
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog: Remove empty attributes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.BreadCrumbs: Add 'tabindex' on the correct element
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: Equalize width of single and multiple rows groups
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Avatar: Acc sample improved
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Acc sample improved
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now have 'open in new tab/window' and 'submenu creation on context menu' support in the context menu in list report and object page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support the summarization service
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support the TextArrangement annotation for DataField with IBN
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: The object page tables now support path based UI.Hidden annotation
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now correctly handle semantic dates within the Save as Tile option
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now enabled the copy functionality for all table types
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now resolved the issue with displaying the Paste button in the object page table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support the TextArrangement annotation in the Create dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer show the list report card in the Collaboration Manager if the object page is open

    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added an option to display the action button on the header while adapting the UI of the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now validate the links embedded in messages
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added an option to remove the action button in the header while adapting the UI of the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now restrict merging the subsection title with the control title if the section contains only one subsection within the object page in the IconTabBar mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved the issue with the paste functionality

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IllustratedMessage: Fixed TNT chart illustrations
