item.title: Version 1.123.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.123.1

  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now align the column correctly when the table entity has no key

item.title: Version 1.124.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: FCL: Restore focus same column fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Card with Auto data mode can be reached by keyboard
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Title alignment
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.ShellBar: New Assistant color added
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Fix wrongly sized mid column
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide an option to merge the control title and section title for custom sections
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a building block for the tree table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We have improved the suggestions for recently entered values
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the manifest to customize the export settings of a column
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide support for consuming design time cards in SAP Collaboration Manager
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the Share as Card option to share the design time cards created by the card generator, if the cards are provided for an object page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the useSingleTextAreaFieldAsNotes setting in the manifest to allow end users to choose to hide the label of the single text-area field in a form
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the useSingleTextAreaFieldAsNotes setting in the manifest to allow end users to choose to hide the label of the single text-area field in a form
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support the @Common.ExternalID annotation for fields that have a technical ID as the key
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: The contact card now shows the contact's availability from Microsoft Teams
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support side effects events triggered by the application server
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the list report extension API to programmatically update view content and refresh its count
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Applications can now dynamically display the ‘Summarize’ button if the prerequisites are fulfilled
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly encode URL parameters when navigating away from the quickview popover
    • Type: FIX, Description: The filter bar now works properly with custom filter fields in multi-view mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: Now we get the correct label from annotations for the filter fields where manifest settings are passed without the label property.
    • Type: FIX, Description: In InlineCreationRows mode, we now correctly recreate the empty row after deleting it in a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue related to a redundant error message popup
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support navigation properties also on the nonFilterableProperties list of filter restrictions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly manage the exceptions from the shell navigation service while fetching the list of semantic objects from the intents the current user can navigate to
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show a generic message for actions that fail with strict handling
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that only the 'Delete' action is available in the context menu for an empty row
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the message popover for tables displays the column name that’s associated to the error
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field templating: The relative path is now correctly considered in the binding of editable, required, enabled, and editMode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve harmonized the naming of custom filters in the flexible programming model explorer
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly manage the page ID parameter in the changePageConfiguration extension point to apply configuration changes that can also be used as a feature toggle
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide an option to merge the control title and section title for custom sections
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a building block for the tree table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We have improved the suggestions for recently entered values
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the manifest to customize the export settings of a column
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide support for consuming design time cards in SAP Collaboration Manager
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the Share as Card option to share the design time cards created by the card generator, if the cards are provided for an object page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the useSingleTextAreaFieldAsNotes setting in the manifest to allow end users to choose to hide the label of the single text-area field in a form
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the useSingleTextAreaFieldAsNotes setting in the manifest to allow end users to choose to hide the label of the single text-area field in a form
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support the @Common.ExternalID annotation for fields that have a technical ID as the key
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support an experimental feature to dynamically instantiate specific building blocks using controller coding
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: The contact card now shows the contact's availability from Microsoft Teams
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Applications can now dynamically display the ‘Summarize’ button if the prerequisites are fulfilled
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that filter fields removed by adaptation are not visible again when we reload the page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly encode URL parameters when navigating away from the quickview popover
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now align the column correctly when the table entity has no key
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've removed the fixed contentWidth for the draft indicator popover
    • Type: FIX, Description: Now we get the correct label from annotations for the filter fields where manifest settings are passed without the label property.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue related to the execution of actions for multiple entries in a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: In the header of a contact card, we now display round borders for images and icons pertaining to people, otherwise we display square borders
    • Type: FIX, Description: In the header of a quickview, we now display round borders for images and icons pertaining to people, otherwise we display square borders
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now clear the messageTargetProperty to ensure the navigation works correctly after saving changes on the subobject page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that only the 'Delete' action is available in the context menu for an empty row
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with row selection in a context-dependent value help dialog with multiple selections
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly apply the filter for drafts, even when the filter bar is hidden
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that card manifest can be created with deep nested app manifest
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the radial micro chart is rendered without the TargetValue annotation
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide an option to merge the control title and section title for custom sections
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the manifest to customize the export settings of a column
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide support for consuming design time cards in SAP Collaboration Manager
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the Share as Card option to share the design time cards created by the card generator, if the cards are provided for an object page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the useSingleTextAreaFieldAsNotes setting in the manifest to allow end users to choose to hide the label of the single text-area field in a form
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the useSingleTextAreaFieldAsNotes setting in the manifest to allow end users to choose to hide the label of the single text-area field in a form
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support side effects events triggered by the application server
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the list report extension API to programmatically update view content and refresh its count
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: App developers can now use SAP Fiori tools in adaptation projects to adapt the object page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Applications can now dynamically display the ‘Summarize’ button if the prerequisites are fulfilled
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that filter fields removed by adaptation are not visible again when we reload the page
    • Type: FIX, Description: Now we get the correct label from annotations for the filter fields where manifest settings are passed without the label property.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that only the 'Delete' action is available in the context menu for an empty row
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly apply the filter for drafts, even when the filter bar is hidden
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the type-ahead popup that appears automatically upon initial loading
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: Avoid creating invalidate promise on table update when the update reason is 'UNKNOWN'
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: For GenericTile, we've now updated the badge element name to Tileinfo, and also created a new enum TileInfoColor that adds color to the TileInfo element
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support snapToRow property that sets the height of the inner controls to 100%
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now introduced the badge element that is used within the GenericTile control as a combination of an icon and a text
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.MessageBox: Add new dependentOn option
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've have now introduced the enableDynamicHeight property for the tiles to expand dynamically when the content inside the tiles expands
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Exception prevented in case of tabular suggestions
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog: The toolbar spacer is no longer hidden on phone
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Available items announcement improved
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: Speech output corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Prevent suggestions popover closing on Enter key
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Prevent value DOM update when password type is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: GenericTile: Remove the critical color on the text when the tile is in ActionMode
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MaskInput: remove too descriptive label
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Badge is visible on tab with text and icon - inline mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IllustratedMessage: Prevent infinite resize
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Title font-size fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Fix left aligment in Tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Slider: Accessibility samples adjusments
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Inverted status is displayed correctly in Form
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Avatar: Fix image loading of Avatar
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: fix footer buttons visibility when there is not enough space
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Fix closing Popover with ComboBox
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: ValueStateMessage with FormattedText displays links twice
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePickerClock: fixed time selection when the page is scrolled
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: Do not delete tokens on RIGHT arrow navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: fix popup rendering
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: [FEATURE] We've now introduced the UploadSetwithTable plugin for Tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: [FEATURE] We've now introduced the badge element that is used within the GenericTile control as a combination of an icon and a text
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: [FEATURE] For GenericTile, we've now updated the badge element name to Tileinfo, and also created a new enum TileInfoColor that adds color to the TileInfo element
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: [FEATURE] We now support snapToRow property that sets the height of the inner controls to 100%
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: [FEATURE] We've have now introduced the enableDynamicHeight property for the tiles to expand dynamically when the content inside the tiles expands
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now introduced contact quick view cards within the list report, object page, and analytical list report, for Microsoft integration
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Sharing a designtime card is now possible using Microsoft Teams
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now enabled context menu for the analytical list page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now show or hide the inline creation row based on the change in the creatable path value
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show or hide the inline creation row based on the change in the creatable path value
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have adapted the FE code to handle the hostname related changes in the response sent from gateway
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that additional columns are not displayed on non pastable columns
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the error that was breaking the code due to the presence of an additional comma in the width property of AnalyticalColumn
    • Type: FIX, Description: Consume getCustomColumns() to find out custom columns
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have fixed the issue with the unexpected variant management that was appearing in the object page header due to side effect related change
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap-icons-tnt: Fixed wrong icon names
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SmartTable: Enable Copy to Clipboard
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SmartField: Call for description for empty strings is now suppressed
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: FilterBar/SmartFilterBar: Focus position after closing the Adapt Filters dialog is now improved
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: ShowAllFilters button shown incorrectly
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: The message that the table returns when no results are found is now according to the guidelines
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Empty selection for Boolean fields now has meaningful text
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Unhandled promise rejection resolved
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: Filters order is now correctly saved
    • Type: FIX, Description: Personalization: DimeasureControler now keeps correct order for visible dimensions
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: respect visible property of ControlConfiguration in advancedMode
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Test Starter: Support ui5:// URLs for "page"
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: core/UIComponent: Provide internal hook for router class definition
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/base/util/Version: fix type signature of `compareTo` method
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/LabelEnablement: getIdForLabel only on sap.ui.core.Control
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.type.Unit/Currency#formatValue: document precedence of maxFractionDigits,scale and decimal places
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Index tree item scrolling tweak
    • Type: FIX, Description: DemoKit: ScrollToElement in ApiiRef master-side corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Samples default theme fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.generic.app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the strict handling is correctly sent in the HTTP request header
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Card with Auto data mode can be reached by keyboard
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration cards: Fixed pagination with microcharts
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.HorizontalLayout: adding an accessibility test page
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: FilterField: copy Tokens as key/description pairs
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDCTable: Reset via p13n/settings dialog
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: adding an accessibility test page
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: name setters now work properly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: update type info for uploadComplete event
  • Library: sap.ui.vk
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Support rendering PMI meshes without normals
    • Type: FIX, Description: Fix setting double-sided flag on PMI meshes with non-zero render order
    • Type: FIX, Description: Right click gesture in viewer for spherical
    • Type: FIX, Description: Read node contentType from .vds4
  • Library: sap.uiext.inbox
    • Type: FIX, Description: Missing deprecation labels of sap.uiext.inbox in the documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Missing deprecation labels of sap.uiext.inbox in the documentation
  • Library: sap.ushell
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ushell.ui.shell.SysInfoBar: Additional colors added
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Consume uploaded custom logo
    • Type: FIX, Description: about dialog in search case: technical component id
    • Type: FIX, Description: Validate URL in sap.m.MessagePopover
    • Type: FIX, Description: NavTargetResolution: Add dependencies for async preload
    • Type: FIX, Description: Correct TileCard based on new Integration Card Renderer
    • Type: FIX, Description: Endless loading in App Finder tile mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: CSP error on test case
    • Type: FIX, Description: Move AppFinder to ShellBar when Personalization is disabled
    • Type: FIX, Description: Fix JSDOC typo in url parsing service
    • Type: FIX, Description: CEP Search popover reopens after ListItem is pressed
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: ObjectPageLayout: Fix lazy loading of data of BlockBases

item.title: Version 1.124.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.1

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Card: dataTimestamp added to ariaLabbeledby
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Discard Draft popup works correctly when navigating away from a subobject page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the criticality remains correct after the creation of a new entity, by ensuring the update event is always triggered
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now correctly navigate between newly created items in sticky mode
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the MultiValue fields don't create additional requests in display mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: Value is now marked as selected in value help on the list report
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve reduced the number of API calls to improve the performance when loading a quick view
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed an issue that occurred while navigating from a quick view to another app, where the semantic object mappings are not applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now clear the field values of non-string fields using the mass edit dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the value help of MultiValue fields in action parameter dialogs works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls with validation errors and back-end errors
    • Type: FIX, Description: SideEffects network requests applied on structural changes like create and delete, that rely on the MuliValueField, are now performed in the correct sequence
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the DateTime format for default values when merging it with the startup parameter
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display SAP Fiori launchpad when a user discards a draft by navigating back using the shell button if the object page is the first entry in the browser history
    • Type: FIX, Description: The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls with validation errors and back-end errors
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Value is not cleared on invalidation when type password is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: The cellPress event is fired correctly
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added an additional parameter for the enableMinimalContactsCollaboration API
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog fix data not loading
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Empty string value is now handled correctly in case of SuppressEmptyStringRequest
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/UIComponent: Fix access to routing config
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.(Currency|Unit): use amount scale default 0 instead of currency's or unit's decimal places
    • Type: FIX, Description: Add sap-system to OData V4 service URLs
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Card: dataTimestamp added to ariaLabbeledby
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: UploadSetwithTable: Set correct path definition for sap.m.Link

item.title: Version 1.124.2 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.2

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.GridContainer: Fixed lost focus item navigation
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly evaluate the complex expression for the FieldControl annotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that fields with currencies based on an integer value work correctly in edit mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that side effects are applied on radio buttons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the navigate function in the routing controller extension supports the preserveHistory parameter
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly evaluate the complex expression for the FieldControl annotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where values selected from the value help could not be removed in the group view of the Adapt Filters dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where the multi-input field did not appear
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that fields with currencies based on an integer value work correctly in edit mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider the intent parameters of SAP Fiori launchpad while displaying the title with a primary action as a link in the quick view
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that side effects are applied on radio buttons
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed an issue that caused unintended row bindings while interacting with draggable shapes in the chart
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbarLayoutData: Typo fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButton: Added wrapping and wrapping type
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Stop initial re-rendering of the input field when type password and clear icon are set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: added possibility to select a day with a ENTER
    • Type: FIX, Description: ActionTile: New changes to align to the latest design
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButton: Text is not cut off by focus when text spacing is applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SearchField: Parameter type is passed correctly to ResourceBundle
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Back type button has correct hover colour
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now provide a tooltip for an avatar in a contact card
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly display phone numbers on contact cards
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've refactored the code for the Microsoft Teams collaboration API to make it asynchronous
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: PersonalizationController: restore fixedColumnCount
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: description path in display mode is correct when having expandNavigationProperties set
    • Type: FIX, Description: comp.SmartVariantManagement: wait for translation finishing
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: InputState of Model is now cleared
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONModel#loadData: Don't use JSONP
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.ODataTreeBindingFlat: the value for the magnitude is always converted to a number
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.util.LibraryInfo: Loosen baseUrl regex check
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/.library: Remove wrong component for sap/ui/core/util/MockServer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.performance.XHRInterceptor: Fix CORS check
    • Type: FIX, Description: util/Mobile: update window size with delay after viewport is set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.DateFormat.qunit: Fix flaky tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap\ui\core\format\DateFormat.fnCreateDate: set UTCFullYear must be set with all components
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.DynamicSideContent: fixed firing of the breakpointChanged event
  • Library: sap.ui.rta
    • Type: FIX, Description: : sap.ui.rta: Show error dialog in case catalogsIds is returned empty from backend during catalog assignment for key user app variants.
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: AnalyticalTable: Error when binding to named model
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Month/Year/Year Range pickers visual improvements (SFSF)
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: is displayed correctly in RTL for two months view

item.title: Version 1.123.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.123.0

  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: [FIX] Timeline: Reset startDate and endDate on applying null filter for Time Filter type.

item.title: Version 1.125.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.125.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Card: dataTimestamp added to ariaLabbeledby
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: The MultiValueField binding to a JSON model is now publicly available
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the criticality remains correct after the creation of a new entity, by ensuring the update event is always triggered
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Discard Draft popup works correctly when navigating away from a subobject page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly encode the hash used for email URLs
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure a state check for empty rows with duplicate IDs is added
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue with adding filter fields as a variant or flex change
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now overwrite localization messages for Save and Create actions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show the generic message for actions that fail with strict handling with the action name
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now correctly navigate between newly created items in sticky mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure sorting of columns using navigation properties is done correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that page navigation still works in apps using the flexible column layout after navigating to another application
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show recent values in the correct order according to the values in the filter field, with the latest at the top
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that semantic object mappings are correctly applied when navigating from a DataFieldForIntentBasedNavigation using a button
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now clear the selection in a table after applying a search or a filter, except for responsive tables
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: The MultiValueField binding to a JSON model is now publicly available
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve reduced the number of API calls to improve the performance when loading a quick view
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now clear the field values of non-string fields using the mass edit dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the ValueListParameterOut annotation works correctly also when it is used as the description of the value help’s field
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue with adding filter fields as a variant or flex change
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the value help of MultiValue fields in action parameter dialogs works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls with validation errors and back-end errors
    • Type: FIX, Description: SideEffects network requests applied on structural changes like create and delete, that rely on the MuliValueField, are now performed in the correct sequence
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the DateTime format for default values when merging it with the startup parameter
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that a value help with a typeahead opens without errors.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the width of the typeahead table is changed when window is resized
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that reading from undefined conditions is avoided in the type-ahead functionality of the value help
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that BindindInfo filters are properly set
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed an issue that occurred while navigating from a quick view to another app, where the semantic object mappings are not applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the TimePicker is shown for FilterFields of type Edm.TimeOfDay
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now clear the selection in a table after applying a search or a filter, except for responsive tables
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a keyboard shortcut to return to the error list while editing the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now disable the 'Delete' shortcut when the Delete button is not visible
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display SAP Fiori launchpad when a user discards a draft by navigating back using the shell button if the object page is the first entry in the browser history
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue with adding filter fields as a variant or flex change
    • Type: FIX, Description: The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls with validation errors and back-end errors
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the message popover is no longer shown in display mode for messages added using the table API addMessages
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Carousel: the page indicator can be placed over the content of the Carousel
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now introduced isTrustedSource property within sap.m.upload.UploadItem, specifically to preview the pdf type files
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Accessible Improvement for More Link
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Carousel: Added "ariaLabelledBy" association
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: add additional detail to moreLinkPress event
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: new noData aggregation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: Apply focus if page indicator arrow is pressed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Value is not cleared on invalidation when type password is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SearchField: Parameter type is passed correctly to ResourceBundle
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: Tokens creation on paste
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarView: update JSDocs
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: add documentation for getters
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationList: Keyboard navigation is now correct
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.semantic.MessagesIndicator: Add default tooltip
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Icon: fix keyboard support for keys "Space" and "Enter"
